translation.en: [woman] The spirit of the kingdom chooses who will be queen.
translation.zh: 王国之灵决定谁将是女王

translation.en: she will be crowned and blessed with six special powers.
translation.zh: 她将受封 并被赐予六种特殊法力

translation.en: Once chosen by the spirit of the kingdom,
no one born on the land or under the sea
translation.zh: 陆上或海底的任何生灵

translation.en: [in English] does Ekan become a princess at 32?
translation.zh: 艾坎32岁时会成为公主吗？

translation.en: Ekan will become the queen-mother at 32.

translation.zh: 你向来都记得我的生日
我的漂亮女儿 过来

translation.en: [in English] If you like frank your face.
translation.zh: 愿意的话 把脸盖起来

translation.en: [in Pidgin] You are not even beautiful.
You don’t have to insult me. I’ll pay you when I have it.
translation.zh: 没必要侮辱我 我有钱就给你

translation.en: [in English] Nne, this your face is not for making money oh.
translation.zh: 小妮 你的表情这么难看 赚不到钱的

translation.en: [in English] Saturday is gonna be loud.
If you had come earlier, you would have been in front office.
translation.zh: 要是你来得早一点 可以去前台

translation.en: [in Igbo] This your lateness, you have to work on it
translation.zh: 你来晚了 所以得干苦力

translation.en: [in English] Um, I need two plates of shrimp-fried rice.
I can’t see my face in this.
translation.zh: 盘子没像镜子一样干净
妮卡！ 为何现在做这种事？

translation.en: [woman] I've told you, don't be minding that man.
See he's hair is receding, that's-- Because of that type of attitude.
translation.zh: 他态度不好 所以发际线越来越高

translation.en: [in Igbo] Come, let me show you something.
translation.zh: 来 我给你看样东西

translation.en: [in Igbo] Ada, please leave me alone.
translation.zh: 艾达 拜托你不要烦我

translation.en: You're telling me to leave you alone? Was I the one who hurt you? Come with me!
translation.zh: 你叫我别烦你？我伤害你了吗？跟我来

translation.en: Telling me to leave you alone. [in English] Let's go.
Irish whiskey with ice, if you have lemon or lime.
translation.zh: 爱尔兰威士忌加冰 加柠檬或酸橙

translation.en: -I'll take it from here. -Oh, thank you.

translation.zh: 给他平时常点的酒 拜托

translation.en: Well, you look happy and relaxed,
translation.zh: 你看起来很开心 也很放松

translation.en: and I thought you needed a treat before your big day tomorrow.
translation.zh: 明天是你的大日子你以为你要好好享受一番
你看起来气色也很不错

translation.en: I don’t have your money yet sir.
translation.zh: 我还没钱付房租 先生

translation.en: Uh, not every time money. Rent.
translation.zh: 不要每次都提钱和房租
有时候你要放松 冷静下来

translation.en: See, you don't have to pay me cash again.
translation.zh: 你看 你不用再给我现金

translation.en: You… you can stay for as long as you want.
You're no longer a baby now. [agrees]
translation.zh: 你已经不是孩子了 是吗？

translation.en: All these things that are standing, Mm, shooting out, front and back.
translation.zh: 所有这些东西都很挺 前凸后翘

translation.en: Are you going to take them to heaven? Mm?
translation.zh: 你要带它们去天堂吗？嗯？

translation.en: -So glad you could make it. -Thank you.
[man] I’ve read your proposal, I must say it’s a brilliant one.
translation.zh: 我看过你的提议了不得不说 相当出色

translation.en: [man] As you know, our head of marketing, Dr. Fatima,
translation.zh: 如你所知我们的营销主管法蒂玛博士出国了

translation.en: is out of the county but she will be back in a few days.
translation.zh: 如你所知我们的营销主管法蒂玛博士出国了 但她几天后会回来

translation.en: She'll be joining this meeting virtually.
translation.zh: 她会通过视频参加这次会议

translation.en: Doc, we have Tony with us.
[Dr. Fatima] Tony, good to see you today.
translation.zh: 托尼 很高兴今天见到你

translation.en: I was impressed with your proposal.
translation.zh: 你的提议让我刮目相看

translation.en: -Thank you. -I told him the same thing.
[Tony] Thank you very much, it really means a lot to me.
translation.zh: 太谢谢了 这对我来说意义重大

translation.en: So you starting with us immediately? Of course.
translation.zh: -所以你会马上开始为我们工作吗？-当然了

translation.en: I’ll be in Nigeria in a couple of days.
translation.zh: 我几天后会回尼日利亚

translation.en: I can’t wait to meet you in person so we can proceed with the plans.
translation.zh: 我迫不及待地想见你这样我们就能按计划行事了

translation.en: Yeah, likewise. Thank you very much.
translation.zh: 嗯 我也是 非常感谢

translation.en: Sir, is this purely on merit?
translation.zh: 先生 这纯属是我应得的吗？

translation.en: [Ada] Nne, did you post that fine picture I took of you the other day on Insta?
translation.zh: 小妮 那天我给你拍的照片很漂亮你在照片墙上发布了吗？

translation.en: [in English] I won't be taking you picture again 'cause you'll just be wasting somebody's talent.
translation.zh: 我不会给你拍照了因为你浪费他人的天赋

translation.en: You didn't even post the this thing.
[Ada] And when you want to post, let me know so I can help you use all the nice filters.
translation.zh: 你想发的时候 告诉我一声我可以用漂亮的滤镜帮你修图

translation.en: [Ada] Are you listening to anything I'm saying at all?
People see what they want to see.
translation.zh: 人们会看到自己想看到的东西

translation.en: I don’t want to be a part of this.
-Part of what? -Leave! [Nneka] What did you see?
translation.zh: -什么的其中？你看到了什么？-走吧！

translation.en: It will be the death of you!
This will be the death of you.
It will be the death of you.
This will be the death of you.
You just jumped off like that, you did not even say anything.
translation.zh: 你当时不辞而别 什么都没说

translation.en: Did Mr. Gbenga ask of me?
"Did Mr. Gbenga ask of me" Someone that has been looking for you since.
translation.zh: “班加先生找我了？” 一直有人找你

translation.en: See, I just took order from table 15,
translation.zh: 你看 我刚刚帮15号桌的客人点餐

translation.en: carry water to them let it not be like you're just coming.
translation.zh: 给他们送水别表现得你好像刚刚才到的样子

translation.en: Mr. Gbenga says if you do not want to be next, you had better return to work.
translation.zh: 班加先生说如果你不想当下一个最好继续工作

translation.en: This Mr. Gbenga should be calming down, please.
translation.zh: 班加先生应该会冷静下来 拜托了

translation.en: So, umm... Mind if I give you a ride home?
[Nneka] You can just drop me off here.
Are you sure you’ll be fine?

translation.zh: 我每天带着这样的心情回家

translation.en: Oh, I was gonna get that.
Thanks for making my day less shitty.
translation.zh: 谢谢你让我今天感觉好过一点

translation.en: And don’t forget to make a wish.
You think you can still -come back to my-- -[thunderclaps]
translation.zh: 你以为你还是可以回来我…

translation.en: You think you can still come back to my house,
after what you did to me?
translation.zh: 你以为你还是可以回来我家？

translation.en: You think I don't know your plan?
translation.zh: 你以为我不知道你的计划吗？

translation.en: You want to kill me and take over my house.
translation.zh: 你想杀了我 夺走我的房子
除此之外 还侮辱我

translation.en: [woman] I’m not here to harm you.
[in Igbo] What do you want from me?
What you want, is what I want.
translation.zh: 你的愿望就是我的愿望

translation.en: [in Igbo] My kingdom was living in peace.
translation.zh: 我的王国曾经一片祥和

translation.en: [woman] In peace and harmony. Until the men of the world came…
translation.zh: 一片祥和 其乐融融直到人世间的人去到那里

translation.en: They invaded my kingdom, my home, and slaughtered all my people.
translation.zh: 他们入侵我的王国 我的家园屠杀了我所有的子民

translation.en: [woman] I let my guard down while trying to save one of my own,
translation.zh: 试图保护我的一个子民时我放下了戒心

translation.en: but I didn’t know it was a setup.
translation.zh: 但我不知道那是一个圈套

translation.en: My most trusted advisor was one of them and they used him to get to me.
translation.zh: 我最信任的谋士是他们中的一员他们利用他来对付我
他们把我们全部消灭了

translation.en: They all took an oath one by one and laid curses on me.
translation.zh: 他们一个个发誓 诅咒我

translation.en: They took away my powers and my kingdom.
translation.zh: 他们夺走了我的法力和王国

translation.en: When they were done, they drove me out.
translation.zh: 完事之后 他们把我赶走

translation.en: They drove me to the waters.
[in English] I’m really sorry about all that happened to you.
translation.zh: 对于你的遭遇 我真的深感遗憾

translation.en: But what does this have to do with me?
[woman in English] It has everything to do with you.
And he wanted the kingdom, and the powers all to himself,
translation.zh: 他希望他和他的子民拥有整个王国

translation.en: [in English] your mother was one of us.
translation.zh: 你母亲是我们中的一员

translation.en: And that makes you one of us.
translation.zh: 所以你也是我们中的一员

translation.en: [woman] He might have been the one holding that sword,
but he definitely wasn't acting alone.
translation.zh: 但绝对不是他一人所为

translation.en: [woman] So now you see that it has everything to do with you.
translation.zh: 所以你现在明白了 这跟你关系重大

translation.en: [woman] Together we can make them pay for everything, they took from us.
translation.zh: 他们夺走了我们的一切摧毁了我们的家庭 我们联手

translation.en: We will do to them what they did to us.
[in English] I don't who... who they are.
And I don't know where they are.
They are hiding, under the guise of the Island project.
translation.zh: 他们躲在岛屿项目的掩护之下

translation.en: Those beads. They used those beads to lay curses on me.
translation.zh: 那些珠子他们利用那些珠子对我下咒

translation.en: You are going to use those same beads To collect my powers from them.
translation.zh: 你要利用同样的珠子从他们身上收集我的法力

translation.en: [woman] The same way they dealt with us, is the same way you'll deal with them.
translation.zh: 他们以前怎样对付我们 你要以牙还牙

translation.en: [woman in Igbo] You have done well.
Your parents will be so happy wherever they may be.
translation.zh: 无论你父母身处何方 都会很开心

translation.en: [queen-mother] Udoka Ojukwu is the head of finance of the Island project.
translation.zh: 乌多卡欧久科是岛屿项目财务部的负责人

translation.en: [in English] He stripped me of my strength.
[queen-mother in Igbo] Women are his weakness.
He always visits the Exclusive lounge after work.
translation.zh: 他下班后 总是会去专属酒廊

translation.en: Deal with him when he least expects it.
translation.zh: 要趁他毫无防备时动手

translation.en: [in English] I can't believe that this is now our reality.
translation.zh: 不敢相信这变成现实了
我们为此付出很大的努力

translation.en: The project is coming along so fast.
translation.zh: 这个项目进行得太快了

translation.en: [man in English] I bow for you oh.
I haven’t balanced my books yet,
And um, I'll be depositing that stuff in the morning.
[Udoka] You know our clientele list is big now. [Udoka] We need to have our own bank.
translation.zh: 你知道我们现在客户很多需要有自己的银行

translation.en: [man in Igbo] No, you're not winning this argument.
[man in English] One for the road.
How do I know who he is?
One more round for this table.
Why don’t I give you a ride? It's late. But I don't wanna inconvenience you.
translation.zh: -要搭顺风车吗？很晚了-我不想麻烦你

translation.en: No, that's not a problem at all.
Let me be your driver for tonight.
translation.zh: 今晚让我当你的司机吧

translation.en: -[knock on car window] -[man] Bro, thought you already left.
translation.zh: 兄弟 我以为你已经走了

translation.en: I'm the chief investigating officer in this case.
translation.zh: 我是这宗案子的首席调查官

translation.en: But why am I still here? I already gave my statement.
translation.zh: 我为何还不能走？我已经录完口供了

translation.en: I just want to ask you a few questions.
Probably there's something you saw or heard.
translation.zh: 也许你看到或听到了什么

translation.en: [Insp. Daniel] Something that you forgot to mention in your statement.
Like I told you, I already gave my statement! There's nothing more to add.
translation.zh: 我说了 我已经录完口供了没什么好补充的

translation.en: [Insp. Daniel] According to your statement, you said uh,
translation.zh: 根据你的口供 你说

translation.en: Mr. Udoka told you he had money to deposit.
translation.zh: 乌多卡先生告诉你 他要存钱

translation.en: Do you by any chance happen to know how much this money was?
translation.zh: 你是否碰巧知道这笔钱的数额？

translation.en: Did you see it with your eyes? Was it in the vehicle?
translation.zh: 你有没有亲眼看到？钱当时在车里吗？

translation.en: What… kind of bloody question is that?
[Mr. Asuquo spluterring] How the hell was I supposed to know how much it is?
translation.zh: 我怎么会知道是多少钱？
听着 我什么都没看到

translation.en: Immediately I saw him, I called you guys.
translation.zh: 我一看到他 就给你们打电话了

translation.en: outside Lagos, outside Nigeria, make sure you let us know.
translation.zh: 离开拉各斯 离开尼日利亚务必要让我们知道
要按章程办事 先生

translation.en: It's normal procedure, you are our key witness.
translation.zh: 这是正常程序 你是我们的关键证人

translation.en: I'm sorry, I have some bad news for you.
translation.zh: 抱歉 有个坏消息要告诉你

translation.en: [Insp. Daniel] Can you please come with me to
the national mortuary to identify the body of Chief Ojukwu.
translation.zh: 去国立太平间鉴定欧久科主管遗体的身份？

translation.en: [in Igbo] I won't be able to do this.
[in Igbo] I don’t want to die.
[in Igbo] You are not alone in this.
[queen-mother] and leave the rest to me.
I don't know, why can’t every day just be like that?
translation.zh: 为什么不能每天都这样？

translation.en: every day could be like that.
Did you pay for those drinks? 'Cause I didn't.
translation.zh: 酒钱是你付的吗？因为我没付

translation.en: [in English] No, wait, wait don't tell me.
translation.zh: 不 等等 别告诉我

translation.en: [in Igbo] Nneka, where did you get the money from?
[in Igbo] It's turn out that I have a wealthy grandma.
translation.zh: 事实证明 我有个有钱的奶奶

translation.en: [in English] Ada, I had no idea she existed.
translation.zh: 艾达 我之前不知道她的存在

translation.en: [in English] And she left me a huge inheritance.
You know that now, you can comfortably start your real estate business.
translation.zh: 你知道你现在可以轻而易举地开始房地产生意了

translation.en: [in Igbo] If you see a big man,
translation.zh: 如果你看到身材高大的男人

translation.en: [both in Igbo] you'll smell of money.

translation.zh: 大家早上好 早上好 夫人

translation.en: This place is now being rebranded.
I would like to present your new boss.
translation.zh: 我给大家介绍一下你们的新老板

translation.en: -Mr. Gbenga-- will no longer be with us. -[Clapping]
translation.zh: -班加先生…-请鼓掌 …从此不在本餐厅工作了

translation.en: That's why I bought you a gift.
I wonder how a snake got into his car.
translation.zh: 不知道他的车里为何有蛇

translation.en: [woman] He wasn't alone in the car.
translation.zh: 他遇害时 车里还有别的东西

translation.en: He also has few scratches on his hand.
translation.zh: 他的手上还有一些抓痕

translation.en: Whoever it was, they got into a really nasty fight with this guy.
translation.zh: 不管是谁 凶手跟他大战了一场

translation.en: Can you stop eating that apple here?
Ma'am, your speech will take ten minutes.
translation.zh: 夫人 您的演讲时间为十分钟

translation.en: Mr. Asuquo unveils the video, then cocktails afterward.
translation.zh: 阿苏奎先生会播放视频接下来会有鸡尾酒会

translation.en: [woman] I already placed your cards out over there.
translation.zh: 我已经把你的卡片放在那里了

translation.en: Oh, by the way, take Mr. Asuquo off.
translation.zh: 对了 取消阿苏奎先生的参会资格

translation.en: I just got off a six-hour flight,
translation.zh: 我刚下飞机 航班长达六小时

translation.en: I'm about to give a billion dollar presentation.
translation.zh: 我即将做一个价值十亿美元的演示

translation.en: I haven't had a decent sleep in 24 hours.
translation.zh: 我已经24小时没好好睡觉了

translation.en: [Dr. Fatima] I am cranky, I am thirsty and I am simply not in the mood.
translation.zh: 我脾气不好 口干舌燥 心情很差

translation.en: you can tell him now so it doesn't come as a surprise.
translation.zh: 可以现在就告诉他这样他就不会觉得很突然
好的 夫人 好 夫人

translation.en: [Dr. Fatima] Now, if I may have everyone's attention.
translation.zh: 现在 请大家注意一下

translation.en: The Island project has been a success thus far.
translation.zh: 岛屿项目到目前为止都很成功

translation.en: Our contractors have done an incredible job,
translation.zh: 我们的承建商干得很出色

translation.en: delivering our vision to our clients.
translation.zh: 把我们的愿景呈现给客户

translation.en: Let me be the first to announce to you,
translation.zh: 请允许我第一个向你们宣布

translation.en: The commencement of the second phase of The Island project.
translation.zh: 岛屿项目的第二阶段正式开始

translation.en: Now, my team and I have done our due diligence,
translation.zh: 现在我和我的团队尽了最大努力

translation.en: to ensure that we don’t alter the ecosystem of the land and sea.
translation.zh: 确保我们不改变陆地和海洋的生态系统

translation.en: I need a drink, do you want anything?
translation.zh: 我要喝一杯 你想喝点什么吗？

translation.en: I hope when it’s ready, you’ll be willing to buy an apartment?
translation.zh: 竣工时 希望你能买一套公寓？
很好 你的眼睛真美

translation.en: [Dr. Fatima] Well, you're one of the lucky ones.
If you don't mind me asking, what perfume is that?
translation.zh: 你若不介意我问一句的话那是什么香水？

translation.en: Oh you're gonna love this one.
Waiting for Ada, but I don't think she's getting off work soon.
translation.zh: 我在等艾达但我觉得她不会马上下班

translation.en: How about I drop you off, if you don't mind?
translation.zh: 不介意的话 我送你怎么样？

translation.en: It's really good to see you again.
So what's with the "small girl big God thing"?
Look, it was all Ada, believe me.
translation.zh: 听着 都是艾达的主意 相信我

translation.en: Is God the new man in your life?
translation.zh: 上帝你生命中的新人吗？

translation.en: To be honest, there is currently no man.
translation.zh: 老实说 我目前没有男人

translation.en: But fingers crossed for the right one to come along.
translation.zh: 但我虔心祈祷会真命天子会出现

translation.en: Any man would be lucky to have you.
translation.zh: 任何男人拥有你都会很幸运

translation.en: Uh, okay. Let me quickly grab something.
translation.zh: 好 让我快速拿东西

translation.en: I'll be back in a bit.
How come you're not laughing? Uh?
Gbenga, what do you think you're doing?
translation.zh: 班加 你以为你在干什么？

translation.en: Nothing. I just want to see what happens to a "small girl big God,"
translation.zh: 什么都没干 我只想看看“淘金女”身陷危机时

translation.en: You don't think that funny, uh?
Or maybe you need your best friend here so you guy can laugh your asses off,
translation.zh: 或者你可以叫你闺蜜过来 你们可以哈哈大笑就像你们在停车场那样？

translation.en: like you did in the car park?
translation.zh: 你们可以哈哈大笑就像你们在停车场那样？

translation.en: and tell her the same joke.
Gbenga, You shouldn't have come here.
translation.zh: 班加 你不该来这里的

translation.en: [queen-mother] So you decided to take this young lady's life?
translation.zh: 所以你决定要 杀了这位小姐？
你被解雇后 应该乖乖别惹事
我应该活得更好 好吗？

translation.en: Only God knows who she slept with to get all that money.
translation.zh: 只有上帝知道她跟谁上床才弄到那么多钱

translation.en: [queen-mother in Igbo] Because you got fired from your job?
You couldn't search for another job?

translation.zh: 你被解雇后 应该乖乖别惹事

translation.en: [Chi chi] I didn't see you at the funeral.
I was actually dressed to go but then something came up.
translation.zh: 我本来穿戴整齐 准备去的但突然有事

translation.en: A meeting is due, don't you think?
translation.zh: 我们要碰面 你不觉得吗？

translation.en: Things are getting out of hand.
I don't think there any need to worry.
translation.zh: 我觉得没什么好担心的

translation.en: [Chi chi]That Udoka and Fatima are dead is cause for us to worry.
translation.zh: 乌多卡和法蒂玛死了所以我们很担心

translation.en: The clouds are heavy and dark over our heads.
Reverend didn't show up as usual.
translation.zh: 牧师没像往常一样出现

translation.en: [Miss Ojukwu] Found these in his um...
[Miss Ojukwu] I think there might be something in here.
translation.zh: 我觉得这里面或许能查到什么线索

translation.en: Do you have a pen I could use? Yeah sure.
translation.zh: -可以借你的笔用吗？-好 没问题

translation.en: Oh no, don't worry, you can just take the clippings with you. Just bring everything back when you're done.
translation.zh: 不 别担心 你可以把剪报带走用完就拿回来就行

translation.en: [queen-mother] He has to be taken out in the dark.
[in Igbo] Because he'll not see us coming in the dark.
translation.zh: 因为在黑暗中 我们才能袭击她

translation.en: You know what to do when you get there.
translation.zh: 你到那里后 就会知道怎么做

translation.en: Don’t you think you should come with me?
translation.zh: 你不觉得你该跟我一起去吗？

translation.en: You need God now more than ever.
translation.zh: 你现在比任何时候都更需要上帝
我知道这令人心烦 对吧？

translation.en: Why don't you pray for us?
translation.zh: 你为何不为我们祈祷呢？

translation.en: [queen-mother in Igbo] We have to be extremely careful next time.
translation.zh: 我们下次一定要非常小心

translation.en: Ada, [in Igbo] I thought he had a wife.
Yes, he does but she's dead.
translation.zh: 对 他有老婆 但她过世了

translation.en: [Ada] Stay there asking me what you should do.
[in English] If you like, don't go and meet him. Stay here and keep asking me questions.
translation.zh: 如果你愿意的话 别去见他待在这里继续问我问题

translation.en: [in Igbo] Tony my child, how are you?
translation.zh: 托尼 我的孩子你好吗？

translation.en: Why the surprise? [in English] Your Dad has been worried about you.
translation.zh: -为什么会意外呢？-你爸很担心你

translation.en: I had some work to do.
Good afternoon ma, my name is uh--
translation.zh: 下午好 夫人 我叫…

translation.en: Young lady, what are you doing in our son's house?
translation.zh: 小姑娘 你在我儿子的家里做什么？

translation.en: [Tony] She actually came to help me out with some stuff, I'm working on.
translation.zh: 她其实是来帮我做工作的

translation.en: This is why you've not been taking our calls.
translation.zh: -是的-所以你才不接我们的电话

translation.en: No mommy, come on, why would I not take your…
translation.zh: 不 妈妈 别这样 我怎么会不接你的…

translation.en: [mom in Igbo] Is there something wrong with your head? [in Igbo] Please take it easy.
translation.zh: -你脑子进水了吗？-别这样 放轻松

translation.en: What is take it easy? Just look at.
Just take a look at her!
[in Igbo] What kind of thing is this? What kind of thing is this!
[mom in Igbo] These children! These children won't kill me. God!
translation.zh: 这些孩子！这些孩子不会杀了我 天啊！

translation.en: [mom] Just look at what she's wearing.
She took my power to control people, and is using it to control others.
translation.zh: 她之前夺走我的法力去控制人们现在又利用它来控制其他人

translation.en: [Tega] Surely, we can put this to rest one last time.
translation.zh: 我们当然可以彻底了结此事

translation.en: I should be asking you that.
Tessy, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 泰茜 你来这里做什么？

translation.en: Tony, we don't know this girl.
translation.zh: 托尼 我们不认识这个女孩

translation.en: I don't know, there’s something about this girl I don’t just like.
translation.zh: 我觉得这女孩有什么地方不对劲

translation.en: Please, I'm not buying it, Tony. I'm not. [Tony in English] You have to just get used to it.
translation.zh: -拜托 我才不信 我不信-你得习惯这点
托尼 这事你别管了

translation.en: [Tessy] Tony, is there food in this house?
translation.zh: 托尼 你家有食物吗？
泰茜 拜托 我们能谈谈吗？

translation.en: If you won't speak to me, at least hear me out.
translation.zh: 如果你不想跟我说话 至少听我说完

translation.en: [Nneka] Look, I know I’m not Ify.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道我不是依菲

translation.en: And I could never replace her.
But I would appreciate it if you give me and Tony a chance.
translation.zh: 但如果你给我和托尼一个机会我会很感激
泰茜 我真的很喜欢他

translation.en: Please tell Tony I've gone home.
[Tessy] Mm, this Nneka girl is not bad.
[queen-mother in Igbo ] You have done so well.
Your parents will be so happy wherever they may be.
translation.zh: 无论你父母身处何方 都会很开心
我们的下一个目标是谁？

translation.en: [man] Not wearing the ring and preaching the gospel,
doesn't make you any less one of us.
translation.zh: 并不表示你不是我们其中一员

translation.en: You can't run away from what's coming.
translation.zh: 你无法逃避即将发生之事
阿拉吉 我们需要解决办法

translation.en: [Tega] It could be any one of us next.
translation.zh: 下一个可能是我们中的任何人
-记住 安东尼 最后一次…-拜托！

translation.en: [Alhaji] He thinks he is better than us.
The universe isn’t on our side this time.
translation.zh: 老天爷这次不是站在我们这边的

translation.en: Maybe we're eventually getting what we deserve.
translation.zh: 也许我们最终会得到报应的

translation.en: What we deserve is a life worthy of living.
translation.zh: 我们理应过着体面的生活

translation.en: [Tega] A life where we’re not afraid of dying any minute.
translation.zh: 我们无需每分每秒都担惊害怕

translation.en: What we deserve is the applaud for putting a bad person where she belongs.
translation.zh: 我们把坏人绳之以法 理应获得掌声
而不是担惊害怕地过活

translation.en: A man who is already down isn’t afraid of dying.
translation.zh: 一个已经倒下的人不怕死

translation.en: [Alhaji] Look, I don’t bloody care what we do or didn’t do.
translation.zh: 听着 我他妈不在乎我们怎么做或之前没做什么

translation.en: We must resolve this before I leave for Abuja tomorrow.
translation.zh: 在我明天前往阿布贾之前我们必须解决这个问题

translation.en: Is there anything we can do to change this?
translation.zh: 我们能做什么来改变这一切吗？

translation.en: There's nothing we do that can ever anything.
translation.zh: 无论我们做什么 都无济于事

translation.en: This your holier than thou attitude is nothing but bullshit!
translation.zh: 你这种道貌岸然的态度纯属胡扯！

translation.en: there's nothing you did that any of us cannot do.
translation.zh: 你做过的任何我们中的任何人都能办到
你… 不是我们的救世主

translation.en: I think we need to connect.
Okay, Charles. We'll see some other time then.
translation.zh: 好 查尔斯 我们改次再见

translation.en: -Let me know when you arrive in Abuja. -Thank you.
Since we're all going to Abuja, why don't we go with my jet?
translation.zh: 既然我们都要去阿布贾为何不用我的私人飞机呢？

translation.en: I think I'll just jump on my own jet. They're done with the pre-flight checks.
translation.zh: 就用我的私人飞机吧飞行前检查已经做完了

translation.en: -Charles of play! We'll see. -Thank you. It's always a pleasure.
translation.zh: -查尔斯 你真风趣-谢谢 不胜荣幸

translation.en: I'll be your hostess this afternoon.
translation.zh: 今天下午 由我来担任空乘人员

translation.en: [woman] Alhaji Abdullahi was found dead in his private jet after landing in Abuja.
translation.zh: 阿拉吉阿卜杜拉赫的私人飞机在阿布贾降落后 有人发现他陈尸其上

translation.en: he was said to be in lagos for business.
translation.zh: 据说他是来拉各斯做生意的

translation.en: he was pronounced dead on arrival at the hospital.
translation.zh: 抵达医院时 医生宣布他死亡

translation.en: The pilots have been questioned but the hostess is nowhere to be found--
translation.zh: 飞行员接受了审讯但空乘人员无迹可寻…

translation.en: said to be cardiac arrest I am Sara--
translation.zh: 据说死因是心搏骤停 我是莎拉…

translation.en: [woman] Oh yes, I'm in my office now.
translation.zh: 是的 我现在在办公室

translation.en: So where did you put Alhaji's file?
translation.zh: 你把阿拉吉的档案放哪里了？

translation.en: What exactly scares you about this whole thing?
translation.zh: 关于这整件事到底有什么让你害怕的？

translation.en: I have nothing to discuss with that man.
translation.zh: 我跟那个人没什么好谈的
嘿 叔叔 这是妮卡

translation.en: I just wanted to find out if you needed anything.
translation.zh: 我只想知道你们有什么需要

translation.en: Oh, thanks, we're good. We're okay.
translation.zh: 谢谢 不用了 没事

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Tony, you have a good eye.
translation.zh: 托尼 你的眼光很好

translation.en: If you had enough power to defeat her the first time,
translation.zh: 如果你的法力足够大第一次就能打败她

translation.en: then all this fear would have been displaced.
translation.zh: 所有这些恐惧都会烟消云散

translation.en: It is who and when, that's the fear.
translation.zh: 关键是何人和何时 这就是恐惧所在

translation.en: Tony, think about our discussion and speak with him.
translation.zh: 托尼 想想我们的讨论 跟他谈谈

translation.en: [Tega] Nice meeting you. Nice meeting you uncle.

translation.zh: 很好 好 亲爱的

translation.en: I'd like to make a toast.
Intelligent, smart, passionate and ambitious girlfriend.
translation.zh: 兰心蕙质、激情满满野心勃勃的女朋友

translation.en: For finally launching her real estate company.
translation.zh: 她终于成立了自己的房地产公司

translation.en: may this be the beginning of new and good things in your life.
translation.zh: 但愿你能开启新生活 满载美好之事

translation.en: Nne baby, you're on fire oh.
translation.zh: 小妮宝贝 你太厉害了

translation.en: [sighs] I'm so glad you could make it.
I'm going to snoop around and see if I could find me a hot catch.
translation.zh: 我要去四处打探一下看看我能不能找到性感男票

translation.en: I know you'd rather not be here.
translation.zh: 我知道你很不情愿在这里

translation.en: We can leave early if you want.
translation.zh: 如果你想 我们可以提前离开

translation.en: Thank you for seeing me on such short notice.
translation.zh: 谢谢您这么快就跟我见面

translation.en: I just wanna ask you a few questions, standard procedure.
translation.zh: 我只想问你几个问题 标准流程

translation.en: Nice event, congratulations. Why you here Inspector?
translation.zh: -这次活动办得真不错 恭喜-你为什么来这里 探长？

translation.en: You were one of the last people who saw Mr. Tega Oghenekaro alive.
translation.zh: 泰加奥盖尼卡罗先生生前见过的最后几个人 你是其中之一

translation.en: Where were you between the hours of six p.m. and midnight? Last night.
translation.zh: 昨晚傍晚6点到午夜期间 你在哪里？

translation.en: With my girlfriend. Doing what young people do.
translation.zh: 跟我女朋友一起 做年轻人做的事

translation.en: Anyway, I saw Uncle Tega earlier that day.
translation.zh: 话说回来那天早些时候我见过泰加叔叔

translation.en: Must be a very painful period, yeah?
translation.zh: 这段时间一定是很痛苦吧？

translation.en: Sorry for the interruption one more time. And congratulations.
translation.zh: 抱歉再打扰你一次 恭喜你

translation.en: I guess I'll be on my way.
And I'll be in touch too.
I need footage of the night Mr. Udoka was killed.
translation.zh: 我需要乌多卡遇害当晚的录像

translation.en: Pull it up, clean and enhanced.
translation.zh: -找出来 要清晰且画质增强的版本-遵命 长官

translation.en: Don't tell me you're still staring.
translation.zh: 别告诉我你还在盯着我看

translation.en: I have to be somewhere, I'll be back in 30 minutes.
translation.zh: 我得去个地方 30分钟后回来

translation.en: Thank you for making me a better person.
Better hurry up because I have a surprise for you.
translation.zh: 最好快点 我有个惊喜要给你

translation.en: And your thirty minutes starts now.

translation.zh: 托尼 等等！你的手机

translation.en: Oh, I think you dropped this.
I'm sorry, but you're in my way.
translation.zh: 抱歉 但你碍了我的事

translation.en: -[Nneka] Good to see you. Oh. -You too dear, go see mommy.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你-彼此彼此 亲爱的 跟妈妈打个招呼

translation.en: It's just a few more minutes.
[Nneka] For some reason, I miss my family.
translation.zh: 不知为何 我很想我的家人

translation.en: [mom] Oh, have you tried reaching them? Did you call them or something?
translation.zh: 你尝试过联系他们吗？给他们打过电话吗？

translation.en: [Tessy] So sorry. I'm so sorry about that.
But you can try and eat something. Okay?
translation.zh: -谢谢-尽量吃点东西吧 -好吗？-好 夫人

translation.en: He told me all these recent deaths are connected.
translation.zh: 他告诉我 最近的死亡事件都有关联

translation.en: I serve a God that doesn't fail.
You and I know that you do not believe in God.
Okay? It's just me and you here, so just stop the pretense already.
translation.zh: 这里只有我和你 别装了

translation.en: You are as fake as they come. Don't speak to me like that.
translation.zh: -你跟他们一样虚伪-别这样跟我说话

translation.en: I'm your father. You are either for God or against him.
translation.zh: -我是你父亲-你要么支持上帝 要么反对他

translation.en: And the saying goes: “By their fruits, you shall know them.”
translation.zh: 俗话说：“凭着他们的果子就可以认出他们来”

translation.en: everything will be revealed to you.
translation.zh: 一切都会在你面前昭然若揭

translation.en: [queen-mother in Igbo] Your heart is troubled, I can tell.
translation.zh: 我看得出来 你心烦意乱

translation.en: Anthony is the next target, isn’t he?
translation.zh: 安东尼是下一个目标 对吗？

translation.en: Anthony deceived me and killed all my people.
translation.zh: 安东尼欺骗了我 杀了我所有的子民

translation.en: [in English] He's the father of the man I love. [queen-mother in English] The man that you love.
translation.zh: -他是所爱之人的父亲-你所爱之人

translation.en: [In Igbo] He is also the man that will come for you on your 32nd birthday.
translation.zh: 你32岁生日时他也是会来找你的那个人

translation.en: [queen-mother] I thought you wanted him to pay for all he did.
translation.zh: 我还以为你想让他罪有应得
相信我 我的确想这样

translation.en: But how do I face Tony afterwards?
translation.zh: 那之后 我要如何面对托尼？

translation.en: [in English] How would you face yourself?
[in Igbo] Don't you want to stay alive and get married to the man that you love?
translation.zh: 难道你不想继续活着嫁给自己所爱之人吗？

translation.en: [in Igbo] l want to do it by myself.
[in Igbo] Do it anyhow it pleases you.
You have to be very careful.
He sees and knows things before they happen.
[queen-mother] So you have to be very careful in executing this task.
translation.zh: 所以在执行任务时 你要非常小心

translation.en: [Tony] You've been in there for a while.
I'm fine, I'll be out soon.
translation.zh: 我没事 我很快就出去

translation.en: Just didn’t realize you’ll come in the form of this child.
translation.zh: 只是没想到你会附身在这个孩子的身上

translation.en: [Reverend] You do not deserve to be free.
Of all people you chose her?
translation.zh: 在所有人中 你骗骗选择了她？

translation.en: [Reverend] I would leave no room to chance this time around.
translation.zh: 这次我不会留任何机会

translation.en: What did you do to me?
I’ve dreamt of what this day will be like,
translation.zh: 我曾梦想过这一天会是什么样子

translation.en: I’ve made a few choices in my life that has cost me a lot.
translation.zh: 这辈子 我做了一些选择让我付出很大的代价

translation.en: [Reverend] I preach to the people of God,
hoping that I would adhere to the…
The biggest question I’ve had to ask myself is,
translation.zh: 我需要扪心自问的最大问题是

translation.en: how do I atone for my sins?
Now it is clear to me.
You didn’t deserve what happened to you.
And you certainly didn’t deserve being manipulated and lied to.
translation.zh: 你当然不该被他人操纵和欺骗

translation.en: It is clear what I have to do to make things right.
translation.zh: 我很清楚我该做什么才能弥补过错

translation.en: you have to know the truth.
And to overcome her, this is what we need to do.
translation.zh: 为了战胜她 我们需要这样做

translation.en: She has made you a pawn in all her games.
translation.zh: 在她所有的游戏中她都把你当成了棋子

translation.en: And if she regains all her powers,
translation.zh: 如果她恢复了所有法力

translation.en: it will be the end of everything.

translation.zh: 那声音是什么发出来的？

translation.en: [woman] The number you dialed is switched off. Please try again later.
translation.zh: 您拨打的号码已关机 请稍后再拨

translation.en: I've been trying to reach you.
No, but I didn't want to disturb you because of the funeral.
translation.zh: 但你要操办葬礼 我不想打扰你
下次如果有事 直接告诉我

translation.en: I think she… she's still inside.
[Nneka] Everyone that you wanted dead is dead.
Can't you see you have one bead on your waist?
translation.zh: 你没看到你的腰上还有一颗珠子吗？

translation.en: [queen-mother] The powers remains in his bloodline.
translation.zh: 法力依然保留在他的血脉中

translation.en: -I did everything you asked. -[in English] No.
-Give me Tony. Bring Tony to me! -[gasping]
translation.zh: 把托尼交给我 把托尼带过来！

translation.en: Or will kill both of you just like I killed Ada.
translation.zh: 否则我会杀了你们俩就像我杀了艾达一样

translation.en: how about we go somewhere for your birthday?
translation.zh: 我们去什么地方庆贺你的生日吧？

translation.en: We need some peace and quiet.
Some place different, far from here.
translation.zh: 某个不一样的地方 远离这里

translation.en: Why don't you try and eat your food?
Can't you see that I'm trying?
translation.zh: 你看不出来我在努力吃吗？
我们所为之努力的一切
嘿 去吧 我会跟着你

translation.en: Ah, okay, I need to drop these in the room.
translation.zh: 好 我要把这些放到房间里

translation.en: He wanted you to have this.
everything will be revealed to you.
translation.zh: 一切都会在你面前昭然若揭

translation.en: [queen-mother in Igbo] Why did you let him kill himself?
Don't you know that the power is still in his bloodline?
translation.zh: 你不知道法力依然存留在他的血脉中吗？

translation.en: [Reverend] You are the chosen one You are queen.
translation.zh: 你是天选之人 你是女王

translation.en: I did everything you asked me to do.
translation.zh: 你的吩咐 我都照办了
-我杀了所有人 你…-是我杀了所有人
但是我带你去到现场的

translation.en: -And I gave you my body willingly-- -What body?
translation.zh: -我自愿把我的身体给你…-什么身体？

translation.en: [in Igbo] I made you who you are today.
And I guess that made you irrelevant.
translation.zh: 我想这让你变得不重要了

translation.en: Why don't you just kill me?
Kill me! Isn't that your plan?
translation.zh: 杀了我！你不是打算这么做吗？

translation.en: Nneka, I'm not done with you yet.
translation.zh: 妮卡 我还跟你没完

translation.en: [in Igbo] You have not done all what I need you to do.
translation.zh: 我需要你完成的事 你还没做完

translation.en: [in English] That cycle must be completed.
[in Igbo] Isn’t it why you brought him here?
translation.zh: 正因如此 你才把他带来这里吧？

translation.en: [in Igbo] You have taken everything from me.
[in English] You! Your father, all of you.
translation.zh: 你！ 你的父亲 你们所有人

translation.en: You thought you could defeat me.
[Nneka] Tony, you have to kill me.
[Tony] Get off you. Babe, get off me.
translation.zh: 好 起来 宝贝 起来

translation.en: -What you doing? You're killing me, Nneka. -[gasping]
translation.zh: 你要杀死我了 妮卡

translation.en: What is-- What's going on, Babe? What's wrong with you? -This is your end. -[Tony choking]
translation.zh: -这…怎么回事 宝贝？你怎么了？-这是你的死期
妮卡 你要杀死我了

translation.en: Mommy, I've… I've done some terrible things.
translation.zh: 妈妈 我… 我做了一些很可怕的事

translation.en: You allowed yourself to be taken advantage of.
I thought I was making you proud.
translation.zh: 我以为我会让你引以为傲

translation.en: I let you and daddy down.
[mother] You can never let us down.
translation.zh: 你永远不会让我们失望的

translation.en: We are very proud of you.
I've wasted my life looking for revenge.
translation.zh: 我穷尽一生 只为复仇
不 妮卡 你没死

translation.en: She is. She was never meant to be queen.
translation.zh: 她死了 她注定绝不会当女王

translation.en: Same for the others who tried to use the six special powers
translation.zh: 其他想利用六种特殊法力谋取私利的人
但谢天谢地 你无私牺牲

translation.en: By slaying the Queen-mother, you returned order to the kingdom.
translation.zh: 你杀了太后 让王国的秩序得以恢复

translation.en: [mother] You were chosen for a reason.
translation.zh: 你并非无缘无故就成为天选之人

translation.en: The spirit of the kingdom, always chooses wisely.
translation.zh: 王国之灵向来都会做出明智的选择

translation.en: would have been a better queen.
What if I don't want these powers. What if I don't want this responsibility?
translation.zh: 如果我不想拥有这些法力呢？ 如果我不想承担这份责任呢？

translation.en: What if I just want to be a normal person and live a normal life?
translation.zh: 如果我只想当普通人过平凡无奇的生活呢？
我美丽、聪明、纯真的女儿

translation.en: Your powers are to help protect the kingdom.
translation.zh: 你的法力是为了助力保护这个国度

translation.en: From people who intend to use it for evil.
translation.zh: 阻止那些想利用法力来成就邪恶之事的人

translation.en: Your responsibility is to protect the defenseless.
translation.zh: 你的职责是保护无助之人

translation.en: And mete justice to those who abuse their powers.
translation.zh: 公正无私地对待那些滥用法力的人

translation.en: I know you didn't ask for this, but it's an honor.
translation.zh: 我知道你没主动要求这一切 但这是一种荣耀

translation.en: And a long family tradition to be bestowed with these powers.
translation.zh: 被赋予这些法力是一项悠久的家族传统

translation.en: We are the only true descendants of Queen Ekan.
translation.zh: 我是艾坎女王的正宗嫡系

translation.en: Don't worry my dear, I'll always be here.
translation.zh: 别担心 亲爱的 我会永远陪伴你

translation.en: Go and take your rightful place as queen.
translation.zh: 去堂堂正正地当女王吧

translation.en: -[Tony] God, please. Baby, please wake up. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 天哪 拜托 宝贝 求你醒醒

translation.en: Wake up. It's me, it's Tony. It's Tony.
translation.zh: 醒醒 是我 我是托尼
太好了！呼吸 好样的 呼吸 呼吸 妮卡

translation.en: Hello. We're really glad you enjoyed your time here.
translation.zh: 你好 真庆幸你在这里吃得很尽兴

translation.en: Hope to have you back again. [giggles]
translation.zh: 希望你能再度光临本店

translation.en: It's really doing good. Proud of you.
translation.zh: 你做得很好 真为你骄傲

translation.en: You've said that a thousand times.
[in Igbo] Oh really? I'll keep saying it.
translation.zh: 真的吗？ 我会一直说我喜欢你的新造型 超喜欢的

translation.en: [in English] I'm loving the new look. I love it.
translation.zh: 我会一直说我喜欢你的新造型 超喜欢的

translation.en: Speaking of love. Do you know who would've loved this place?
translation.zh: 说到爱你知道谁会喜欢这个地方吗？

translation.en: Sweetie, I think I see a new face.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 我好像看到了新来的客人

translation.en: I hope you guys enjoyed yourself?

translation.zh: 好 谢谢 请慢用

translation.en: [Nneka] Hello sir, good evening and welcome to Ada's place.
translation.zh: 你好 先生 晚上好欢迎光临艾达餐厅
